content: you,my sir, are a magician! I was about to plunge into my day of emails, deadlines and meetings but a voice inside me told me that I need these 5 minutes..for me..and I am so glad I listened to that voice (yaaay..!) that's her too! thank you thank you thank you…i’m going through what people call a “bad patch” and am trying very hard not to turn it into a “worse patch” so its words of wisdom like these that help me stay afloat!much love and light…
